body.summary: I vote yes to replace the current Interim Constitutional Committee with the elected members of the recent elections held by Intersect.
body.rationaleStatement:
A [PDF version][pdf-link] of this rationale is also made available.

[pdf-link]: https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmWyzTvm4iwJRjzsHFnajCPXykN4N2EzuBPFrkvifdkaAM

## Summary
I vote yes to replace the current Interim Constitutional Committee with the elected members of the recent elections held by Intersect.

## Additional Context
Intersect MBO recently held elections for the replacement of the Interim Constitutional Committees. DReps voted 7 very competent members/groups to whom I perfectly align with my own vote. I therefore fully support the replacement of the current interim CC with the elected one.
